name: #6 Shevarra Stayanoga
description:
Shevarra Stayanoga

Race: Human

Subraces and Variants:
Ethnicity: Rashemi
Dragonmark Variant: Mark of Handling

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 39 years
Height: 5'5"
Weight: 128 lbs.
Eyes: Yellow
Skin: Pale

Gender: Female
Class: Blood Hunter
Blood Hunter Order: Order of the Ghostslayer
Background: Waterdhavian Noble
Occupation: Sailor

Trait: I take great pains to always look my best and follow the latest fashions.
Ideal: Family. Blood runs thicker than water. (Any)
Bond: I am in love with the heir of a family that my family despises.
Flaw: I have an insatiable desire for carnal pleasures.

Description:
Appearance: Pronounced scar
High Ability: Intelligence-studious, learned, inquisitive
Low Ability: Strength-feeble, scrawny
Talent: Paints beautifully
Mannerism: Slurs words, lisps, or stutters
Interaction Trait: Honest
Values: Pain (Evil), Protective of a sentimental keepsake, Protective of a valuable possession
Flaw or Secret: Overpowering greed
